Views
======

How to Edit
------------

1) 	Login

2)  Choose an object on page

3)  Click on more info

4)  Click on edit (you must have permission)

.. figure::  edit.jpg
   :align:   center

5)  After editing click Submit/Shrani   

How to Comment
---------------

1) 	Login with account

2)  Choose an object on page

3)  Write your comment in the comment box

.. figure::  comment.jpg
   :align:   center

4)  Click Submit/Objava button

How to Make new Account
------------------------

1) 	Navigate to the left menu

.. figure::  menu.jpg
   :align:   center

2)  Select 'Registration'

3)  Fill in with personal information (every field is required!)

.. figure::  regBox.jpg
   :align:   center

4)  Click 'Ustvari Raƒçun' button


How to Add new Gadget
----------------------

1) 	Login with account

2)  Navigate to the menu and select 'Publish new gadget'

3)  Fill in the fields required

.. figure::  form.jpg
   :align:   center

4)  Click Submit button
